=== JQueryElement Update History ===
3.9.4 Changes:
 a. Adjust the ResourceLoader control.

 b. Added AppendPoint method to Data object.

3.9.3 Changes:
 a. Add the ResourceLoader control.

3.9.2 Changes:
 a. Increase constructor of Point.

3.9.1 Changes:
 a. Fix some Bug.

3.9 Changes:
 a. Add the Plot control.

3.8.3 Changes:
 a. Modify the Set method of ResponseProgress.

3.8.2 Changes:
 a. Add the ResponseProgress class.

3.8.1 Changes:
 a. Selector can be used without single quotation marks.

3.8 Changes:
 a. Add the Uploader control.

3.7.1 Changes:
 a. No longer need to use the ParameterList or AjaxList.

3.7 Changes:
 a. Add the AjaxManager control.

 b. Ajax javascript method can be written in -:data which will replace data or data.d.     

3.6.4 Changes:
 a. Adjust some bugs.

3.6.3 Changes:
 a. Add SourceAsync property to Autocomplete.
